mapper.insert: insert into category (name, description, blog_id) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{blogId})
mapper.select: select id, name, description, blog_id as blogId from category where blog_id = #{blogId}
select A.id, A.name, A.description, A.blog_id as blogId, count(B.id) as postCnt from category A left join post B on A.id = B.category_id where A.blog_id = #{blogId} group by A.id
select id from category where blog_id = #{blogId} limit 1
